title: About
text:
Mehadi Hasan is a Staff Bioinformatics Scientist at Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, Texas 77030, United States. When not exploring genome sequencing dataset from neuroscience, neurology, neurodegenerative, and neurogenetics related projects, Mehadi enjoys spending time with his family.

Education
University of Alabama at Birmingham, Birmingham, AL MS in Biology (Specialization: Bioinformatics) Jan 2022 - Dec 2023


Current Job
Bioinformatician Baylor College of Medicine Sep 2023 - Present
